about_the_game:
The Giants return to Thea and wreck havoc, threatening to destroy everything you built so far!


The Return of the Giants is the first free DLC for Thea: The Awakening.

Key Features:


  • 70 new events, including a new main, Giant quest line.
  • Events editor that allows you to create your own quests!
  • Additional card artworks and event art.
  • New building types.
  • New creatures and plenty of Giants!
  • Full, English voice over for all events.
  • Game localized to four languages (DE, FR, PL, RU).
  • New music tracks.
  • Many community requested features.

Plus extra fixes and improvements throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 class GPU with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Return of the Giants is a free DLC for Thea: The Awakening. Just as you thought the Darkness was dealt with, a new threat rises and shakes the ground you've built on! Discover 70 new quests, new creatures and buildings and create your very own adventures in Thea!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
